participant_1.name: Emma
participant_1.personality: Curious and introspective, Emma enjoys exploring nature and reflecting on her experiences.
participant_1.background: i've a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i like to go hiking in the mornings to see the sunset. i turned 18 years old yesterday. i just broke up with boyfriend two months ago.

participant_2.personality: Relaxed and easygoing, Liam finds joy in simple pleasures like bubble baths and spending time with his dogs.
participant_2.background: i love taking bubble baths. i'm single and with two dogs. i do not drink alcohol. i'm in my thirties.
